pageContext.claim: “33,000 mining jobs have been added since my inauguration.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump made this comment in the conetxt of coal, but only about 1,000 coal jobs have been created since he became president. Most of the 33,000 jobs he mentions are mining support job in the oil and gas sector. A recent stabilization in oil prices has helped bring some of those jobs back, but it has nothing to do with actions by the Trump administration.
